comment: Not very responsive to emails and usually opened up the weeks work late. Tests and quizzes are easy.

Professor Bryant is not very communicative: If she answers an email, it will be days later. However, she is nice and willing to help. She provides lectures and PowerPoints regularly. There are weekly quizzes and easy labs, three open-book exams, and five extra-credit write-ups. The textbook is required but interesting. It's an easy A!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Took her class online. Her instructions can be confusing at times but she is not a strict grader. Definitely recommend taking her if you want an A.
Online class was straight to the point. Do the assignments and you get good grades. She mostly grades for completion. Responds to emails quickly which is rare. Assignments are quite a lot.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--SO MANY PAPERS--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Professor takes a while to answer you. She was helpful though, when she did answer. This class was pretty easy to me. I put in minimal effort and made an A. The group project is the worst.

I am usually great with online classes, but this professor made it way more difficult. 12 quizzes,5 assignments,midterm,final,and a group project. She is nearly impossible to get in contact with and definitely won't be emailing you back ever during the semester. The group project is beyond tedious and it is hard to meet a group of online students
